name: aframe
description: Building blocks for the VR Web

scripts.build: mkdirp build/ && npm run browserify -- --debug -o build/aframe.js
scripts.dist: npm run dist:min && npm run dist:max
scripts.dist:max: npm run browserify -s -- --debug | exorcist dist/aframe.js.map > dist/aframe.js
scripts.dist:min: npm run browserify -s -- --debug -p [minifyify --map aframe.min.js.map --output dist/aframe.min.js.map] -o dist/aframe.min.js
scripts.dist:release: npm run dist:release:min && npm run dist:release:max
scripts.dist:release:max: npm run browserify -s -- --debug | exorcist dist/aframe-v0.3.0.js.map > dist/aframe-v0.3.0.js
scripts.dist:release:min: npm run browserify -s -- --debug -p [minifyify --map aframe-v0.3.0.min.js.map --output dist/aframe-v0.3.0.min.js.map] -o dist/aframe-v0.3.0.min.js
scripts.preghpages: npm run dist && rimraf gh-pages && mkdirp gh-pages && cp -r {.nojekyll,dist,lib,examples,index.html,style} gh-pages/. 2>/dev/null || : && git checkout dist/ && replace 'build/aframe.js' 'dist/aframe.min.js' gh-pages/ -r --silent
scripts.release:bump: npm run dist && git commit -am 'bump dist' && npm version patch --preminor
scripts.release:push: npm login && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
